Title: Provides a tax incentive to a taxpayer that purchases a bicycle with electric assist or electric scooter
Summary: Provides a tax incentive of fifty percent of the actual cost up to four thousand dollars to a taxpayer that purchases a bicycle with electric assist or electric scooter.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax incentive to a taxpayer that purchases a bicycle with electric assist or electric scooter
